title: Tokopedia Store Key Metrics Monthly Report
description: Monthly report capturing key metrics for a Tokopedia store

Time.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'

Potential_Sales_From_Free_Postage.description: Potential sales from free postage details

Potential_Sales_from_Free_Postage_Served.description: Potential sales from free postage served by Tokopedia details

The_potential_sales_are_not_from_free_po.description: Potential sales not from free postage details

New_order_from_free_postage.description: Number of new orders from free postage

New_orders_from_free_postage_served_by_T.description: Number of new orders from free postage served by Tokopedia

New_orders_are_not_from_free_postage.description: Number of new orders not from free postage

Cancellation_Rejected_Seller.description: Number of canceled orders rejected by the seller

Cancellation_buyer_request.description: Number of canceled orders due to buyer request

Operational_expenditure_details_service_.description: Operational expenditure details for service fees

Operational_expenditure_details_Transact.description: Operational expenditure details transaction service fees

Details_of_Promotion_Expenditures_Free_P.description: Details of Promotion Expenditures Free Postage Served Tokopedia

Details_of_Promotion_Expenditures_Broadc.description: Details of Promotion Expenditures Broadcast Chat
